#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define boost ios::sync_with_stdio(false)
#define INF 1000007
using namespace std;

int graph[205][205]={0};
int w[205][205];
int main()
{
    boost;
    int n,m,k,i,j,kk;
    cin>>n>>m>>k;
     for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
        {
            w[i][j]=INF;
        }
    }
    while(m--)
    {
        int a,b,c;
        cin>>a>>b>>c;
        graph[a][b]=graph[b][a]=c;
    }
    for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
        {
            if(graph[i][j])
                w[i][j]=graph[i][j];
        }
    }
    int g;
    for(g=1;g<=n;g++)
    {
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                if(w[i][j]>w[g][i]+w[g][j])
                    w[i][j]=w[g][i]+w[g][j];
            }
        }
    }
    int q;
    cin>>q;
    while(q--)
    {
        int x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
//      cout<<w[x][y]<<" ";
        if(w[x][y]>k)
        puts("NO");
        else
        puts("YES");
    }
    return 0;
}
